data.title: Paramount Pictures
data.meta_description: Paramount Pictures | 757,968 followers on LinkedIn. We Are Paramount | Founded in 1912, Paramount Pictures works with the entertainment industryâ€™s biggest filmmakers and brightest stars to produce and distribute entertainment around the world. The iconic Paramount logo has opened some of the most successful and beloved films in cinematic history, including timeless classics such as Sunset Boulevard, The Godfather, Forrest Gump and Ferris Buellerâ€™s Day Off; and blockbuster franchises such as Star Trek, Transformers, and Mission: Impossible. Recent innovative break-out films such as Interstellar, Arrival, A Quiet Place and Rocketman have further elevated  Paramountâ€™s film legacy.
data.text: As #PrideMonth wraps, we are filled with joy to look back on the incredible celebrations we held at #Paramount offices around the globe. From Hungary to Argentina, Milan to the UK, and across the US, our events brought our employees together in powerful ways and highlighted our global commitment to celebrating the #LGBTQ+ community. Thank you to everyone who joined us and contributed to making #Pride unforgettable. Let's continue to build on this spirit of love, empathy, and solidarity throughout the year! ðŸŒˆ #WeAreParamount
